name: Slime-san (itch)
description:
A terribly cute slime wants to eat all his pairs who have been transformed into candy for Halloween.

Help him, maybe he'll give you some of his candy. 

(Just a barebone platformer made in a few hours to test git. Maybe we'll work more on it later !)

_____________________

Controls :

Move :  Z Q S D + Arrows keys

Jump : SPACE BAR

_____________________

Game designer : Whismirk / Cesar-123 / Lisab / Virgule12

Art : Flofloups
